sourcesContent:
export const data = [
    {
      id: 1,
      title: "Valparai",
      desc:
        "Nestled amidst the lush Western Ghats, Valparai enchants with its mist-kissed hills and vibrant tea gardens, inviting adventurers to explore its verdant beauty and serenity.",
      image:
        "https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9PMA_Z16TLM/TiCKT0aSwtI/AAAAAAAAo74/s_TInanWtFU/Munnar%2BHill%2BStation%2BKerala%2B-%2BBeautiful%2BPhotos%2B%252819%2529.JPG",
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      title: "Ooty",
      desc:
      "Nestled amidst the verdant Nilgiri Hills, Ooty enchants with its serene lakes and mist-kissed tea estates, offering a picturesque escape into nature's embrace.",
      image:
        "https://bigseventravel.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/john-hernandez-IL-fBBnF-GU-unsplash-1920x1440.jpg",
    },
    {
      id: 3,
      title: "Kodaikanal",
      desc:
      "Where misty mountains embrace azure lakes, weaving magic in the heart of Tamil Nadu's hill country.Discover the tranquil charm of Kodaikanal, where lush greenery and cool breezes beckon travelers to an enchanting escape.",
      image: "https://static.toiimg.com/photo/78034489/kodaikanal.jpg?width=748&resize=4",
    },
    {
      id: 4,
      title: "Chikmangalore",
      desc:
        "Where verdant hills meet aromatic coffee plantations, a haven for nature enthusiasts and coffee aficionados alike.Discover Chikmagalur: A picturesque retreat nestled amidst lush greenery, famed for its rich coffee culture and breathtaking landscapes.",
      image:
        "https://th.bing.com/th/id/OIP.aYH7fVqdqoFlGDlgCMtyZgHaE8?rs=1&pid=ImgDetMain",
    },
    {
      id: 5,
      title: "Erkadu",
      desc:
        "Where Tradition Meets Tomorrow's Innovation in a Harmonious Blend. Explore the Rich Tapestry of Culture and Progress in Every Corner.",
      image: "https://i.hurimg.com/i/hdn/75/0x0/5aa10544d3806c25541af273.jpg",
    },
    {
      id: 6,
      title: "Nilgiris",
      desc:
        "Where verdant hills meet azure skies, enchanting souls with nature's timeless embrace.Discover Nilgiris: A sanctuary of mist-kissed peaks and lush valleys, where every moment is a breath of fresh wonder.",
      image:
        "https://d2rdhxfof4qmbb.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/20180221130827/iStock-155381519.jpg",
    },
    {
      id: 7,
      title: "Conoor",
      desc:
        "Where lush tea gardens meet misty mountains, painting a serene canvas of tranquility and charm.",
      image:
        "https://www.qantas.com/content/travelinsider/en/explore/europe/italy/venice/things-you-need-to-know-before-you-go-to-venice/_jcr_content/parsysTop/hero.img.full.medium.jpg/1535006246068.jpg",
    },
    {
      id: 8,
      title: "Kotagiri",
      desc:
        "Embrace tranquility amidst the lush hills of Kotagiri, where tea plantations meet azure skies, offering a serene escape into nature's embrace.",
      image: "https://lp-cms-production.imgix.net/2020-11/GettyRF_494057771.jpg",
    },
    {
      id: 9,
      title: "Topslip",
      desc:
        "Where lush greenery meets adventure's embrace. Explore the pristine beauty of nature's haven nestled in the heart of the Anamalai Tiger Reserve.",
      image:
        "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1579033461380-adb47c3eb938?ixid=MXwxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MXx8bm9ydGhlcm4lMjBsaWdodHN8ZW58MHx8MHw%3D&ixlib=rb-1.2.1&w=1000&q=80",
    },
    {
      id: 10,
      title: "Munnar",
      desc:
      "Nestled amidst emerald tea plantations and mist-laden hills, Munnar beckons with its serene charm, offering a tranquil haven in the lap of nature.",
      image:
        "https://lp-cms-production.imgix.net/2019-06/GettyImages-560611321_full.jpg?fit=crop&q=40&sharp=10&vib=20&auto=format&ixlib=react-8.6.4",
    },
    {
      id: 11,
      title: "Yelagiri",
      desc:
        "Where verdant hills meet azure skies, offering a tranquil escape for nature enthusiasts and adventure seekers alike.",
      image: "https://wallpaperaccess.com/full/534182.jpg",
    },
    {
      id: 12,
      title: "Bellikkal",
      desc:
        "Experience the allure of Bellikal: where vibrant culture meets breathtaking landscapes, beckoning you to explore a world of wonder.",
      image:
        "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1444076784383-69ff7bae1b0a?ixid=MXwxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MTJ8fGxvd2VyJTIwYW50ZWxvcGUlMjBjYW55b258ZW58MHx8MHw%3D&ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500&q=60",
    },
  ];
  
  export default data;
